summary:
This mod adds a very strong Skeleton called "Evil Nightshade Assassin" to the game.
If you manage to take it down you'll get rewarded with a strong bow and a new summoning spell.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a very strong Skeleton archer called "Evil Nightshade Assassin" to the game. 
It's walking around near the Abandoned Shack in the swamp-like area of Hjaalmarch.
If you manage to take it down you'll get rewarded with the "Nightshade Bow", 100 Ebony Arrows and a new summoning spell (Summon Nightshade Assassin)

But be aware of it's very high damage output. One arrow will most likely be enough to take you down. 
The Evil Nightshade Assassin level is the players level x 2. So if you are lvl 20 it will be lvl 40. 
By killing the skeleton you'll obtain a Spell Tome which allows you to summon a Nightshade Assassin. 
The Nightshade Assassin level is the player level x 1.5. So if you are lvl 20 it will be lvl 30.
It has the same damage output as the Evil Nightshade Assassin.

This mod may not fit everyones taste because the bow and the summoning spell are too strong for vanilla skyrim. 
In the first place I createt this mod  to have fun with my necromancer character. Skeletons are essentail for a true necromancer in my opinion but sadly skeletons are entirely useless in vanilla Skyrim. I uploaded this mod in case someone feels the way I do and wants to have fun with some badass skeleton archer.
author: Replicant44
